amendment.description: To prevent the creation of duplicative and overlapping Federal programs.

action.text: Amendment SA 1473 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 1470.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1473, under the order of 2/2/2012, not having achieved 67 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 39. Record Vote Number: 10.
